Coronavirus carriers who lie to contact tracers face a fine of £5,000 and 12 months in prison, The Times has learnt.

articles.title: Up to 20pc of hospital patients with coronavirus contracted virus in hospital - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: It's understood that up to a fifth of coronavirus patients contracted the illness after already being admitted to hospital
articles.content:
Up to a fifth of patients with coronavirus in several hospitals contracted the disease while being treated as in-patients for another illness, senior doctors and nurses have been informed.
